title: Tech Conference 2025
description: A gathering of technology leaders and enthusiasts to discuss emerging trends in AI, robotics, and innovation.
ongoingNews: Registrations are open, keynote speakers are being announced weekly.

title: Startup Pitch Night
description: A platform for budding entrepreneurs to pitch their startup ideas to investors.
conclusion: Five startups secured funding, and two were selected for mentorship programs.

title: AI & Machine Learning Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop focused on building ML models and understanding neural networks.
ongoingNews: Only a few seats left, early bird registration ends soon.

title: Photography Exhibition
description: An exhibition showcasing work of local and international photographers.
conclusion: Over 200 visitors attended, with three photographers winning recognition awards.

title: Hackathon: Code for Change
description: 24-hour hackathon to create innovative solutions for social problems.
ongoingNews: Team registrations are still open and mentors have been finalized.

title: Music Festival
description: A night filled with live performances, bands, and food stalls.
ongoingNews: Stage setup is in progress, tickets are selling fast.

title: Art & Culture Fair
description: Celebration of art, dance, and traditions from various cultures.
ongoingNews: Local artisans and performers are being invited.

title: Yoga & Wellness Retreat
description: A full-day retreat focused on mindfulness, yoga, and healthy living.
conclusion: Participants reported improved mental clarity and physical relaxation.

title: Blockchain Bootcamp
description: Learn blockchain fundamentals and build your first decentralized app.
ongoingNews: Developers and blockchain experts have been confirmed as mentors.

title: Food & Drinks Festival
description: Taste delicacies from local and international chefs with live cooking shows.
conclusion: Crowd-favorite dish award went to a local Nepali chef.

title: Startup Networking Brunch
description: Networking event for startup founders, investors, and mentors.
ongoingNews: The final guest list is being curated to ensure quality networking.

title: Robotics Expo
description: Showcase of latest innovations in robotics and automation.
ongoingNews: Several universities have confirmed their participation.

title: Movie Night: Sci-Fi Special
description: Special screening of top-rated science fiction films under the stars.
conclusion: Audience voted 'Interstellar' as the best movie of the night.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Day
description: Workshops and seminars to spread awareness about online safety.
ongoingNews: Ethical hacking competition slots are filling up fast.

title: Cloud Computing Summit
description: Industry experts discuss the future of cloud technologies and services.
ongoingNews: Keynote topics have been announced on the official website.

title: Dance & Music Competition
description: Competition for talented dancers and musicians from across the region.
ongoingNews: Audition videos are currently being reviewed.

title: Sports Day
description: Annual sports meet with multiple games and fun activities.
conclusion: The event ended with a closing ceremony and prize distribution.

title: E-Sports Championship
description: Competitive gaming event with cash prizes and live streaming.
ongoingNews: Team registrations are ongoing and sponsorships are being confirmed.

title: Science Fair 2025
description: A fair to showcase innovative science projects from students.
ongoingNews: Project submission deadline extended by two days.

title: Coding Bootcamp
description: Intensive bootcamp covering full-stack web development.
conclusion: Participants successfully deployed real-world projects at the end of the program.
